articles.description: Follow live text and radio commentary featuring Jack Draper and Coco Gauff at the Australian Open.

articles.description: Premier League reaction after Liverpool draw at Nottingham Forest and Chelsea and Man City also draw, plus latest transfer news.
articles.title: Transfers and Premier League reaction LIVE: Liverpool draw at Forest, plus Man City, Chelsea

articles.description: Nottingham Forest's heroics were only undone by a genius double substitution by Liverpool boss Arne Slot, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Nottingham Forest 1-1 Liverpool: Hosts' heroics undone by Slot's super sub on night of pure theatre

articles.description: Britain's Jodie Burrage gives a good account of herself but is beaten in straight sets by Coco Gauff in the Australian Open second round.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025 results: Jodie Burrage loses to Coco Gauff in Melbourne second round

articles.description: As Arsenal prepare to host Tottenham in the Premier League, BBC Sport looks at why frustration is beginning to grow at the club.
articles.title: Arsenal vs Tottenham: Why is frustration growing at Mikel Arteta's Gunners?

articles.description: Former Everton manager Sean Dyche says successor David Moyes will "build on the stable footing we have implemented".
articles.title: Everton: Sean Dyche says David Moyes will 'push club forward'

articles.description: Qinwen Zheng admits it was not her day as she was beaten in the Australian Open second round in the biggest shock of the tournament so far.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025 results: Qinwen Zheng out in biggest shock so far but Aryna Sabalenka through

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Brentford vs Manchester City in the Premier League
articles.title: Brentford vs Manchester City: Premier League preview, team news, head-to-head & stats

articles.description: Novak Djokovic surpasses Roger Federer's all-time record for the most major singles matches played as he reaches the Australian Open third round.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025 results: Novak Djokovic breaks Roger Federer record with win over Jaime Faria

articles.description: Tiger Woods says his Jupiter Links team would have not broken 100 after suffering a heavy defeat in their opening match of the indoor Tomorrow's Golf League.
articles.title: Tiger Woods makes TGL debut as Jupiter thrashed by Los Angeles
